title: Inauguration of Pain Medicine and Palliative Care Services
cleaned_text: Cabinet Minister [Dr Mansukh Mandaviya ](https://mansukhmandaviya.in/) Ministry of Health and Family Welfare Government of India Click to visit page Minister of State [Dr. Bharati Pravin Pawar ](#) Ministry of Health and Family Welfare Government of India Click to visit page Hon'ble Minister of state, H & FW [Prof. S.P. Singh Baghel ](#) Click to Gorakhpur [Mr. Desh Deepak Verma Gorakhpur [Dr Surekha Kishore Gorakhpur AIIMS, Gorakhpur is one of the new AIIMS established as a part of the initiative under Pradhan Mantri Swasthya Suraksha Yojna (PMSSY) by the Ministry of Health and family welfare, Govt. of India. These institutes have been established with the aim of correcting regional imbalances in quality tertiary level healthcare in the country, and attaining self- sufficiency in graduate and postgraduate medical education and training. AIIMS, Gorakhpur will impart both undergraduate and postgraduate medical education in all branches of medical science and related field, along with nursing and paramedical training to bring together in one place, educational facilities of the highest order for the training of personnel in all branches of health care activities. Hands on Experience from 25th-26th August 2023 being organised by Department of clinical microbiology at AIIMS Gorakhpur](https://aiimsgorakhpur.edu.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Molecular-Biology-workshop_Final_updated-1.pdf) Latest Events Quick Access (Click to Visit) Hospital Services at AIIMS, Gorakhpur Patient care at AIIMS, Gorakhpur The Outpatient Department (OPD) at AIIMS, Gorakhpur is completely paperless from the day of its inception. The OPD occupies a very important value in any Institute or hospital and is considered to be a window to the Hospital care.The OPD is the most appropriate place for health education for healthcare professionals. Medical Education at AIIMS, Gorakhpur AIIMS, Gorakhpur will follow the mandate of all other AIIMS to become a leader in Health services and be a Centre of excellence in Medical Education Technology (MET) in the country. AIIMS, Gorakhpur will provide student centered, problem based, integrated, community oriented and experiential learning for the students About Gorakhpur Gorakhpur is an important city along the banks of the Rapti river in the north-eastern part of the state of Uttar Pradesh. It is 273 kilometres east of the state capital Lucknow. It is the administrative headquarters of Gorakhpur district and Gorakhpur division. The city is home to the Gorakhnath Math, a Gorakshanath temple.
